fields.value: Hometowns and Commutes of Grinnell Faculty and Staff

dsDescriptionValue.value: Using data available about the hometowns of Grinnell's faculty and staff and estimated round-trip distances of their daily commutes, we constructed a chart comparing the total amount of carbon emissions coming from each town in which Grinnell faculty and staff reside. The purpose of the chart is to demonstrate how an increase in carpooling among people who work at the college would positively impact the environment.

files.description: This document contains the chart constructed from the data, and compares total carbon emissions per city with mean round-trip commutes.
files.label: Commutes.doc

dataFile.description: This document contains the chart constructed from the data, and compares total carbon emissions per city with mean round-trip commutes.

files.description: This document contains the raw data: cities/hometowns, mean round-trip distances, number of commuters per city, and total distance (emissions) per city.
files.label: Commutes.tab

dataFile.description: This document contains the raw data: cities/hometowns, mean round-trip distances, number of commuters per city, and total distance (emissions) per city.
